steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"3gcbt","text":"Make up   of fresh Phosphate Buffered Saline (PBS) from 10x stock solution.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":8,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"euaar","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"E2846600FF8E11EDAD3E550E6E80938D","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":3}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e8s62","text":"Make up PBS-T: 0.2–0.5% Triton X-100 in PBS (stir   Triton in   of PBS).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":50,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":62,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"52uc0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"100-250","error":false,"guid":"EA00E700FF8E11EDAD3E550E6E80938D","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":5}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"50","error":false,"guid":"F1861A90FF8E11EDAD3E550E6E80938D","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a5pvt","text":"Place each series in a glass vial and rinse mouse brain sections with PBS 3 times before starting primary reactions.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3fbjc","text":"Add   of PBS-T with 2% Normal Donkey Serum ( ) to each series and swirl briefly.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":44,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bqulv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"044DD7D0FF8F11EDAD3E550E6E80938D","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"20","error":false,"guid":"09994800FF8F11EDAD3E550E6E80938D","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"csm6q","text":"Optional blocking step: leave slices in PBS-T and 2% Normal Donkey Serum at   for 45–60 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":22}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":76,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3rakg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"1402AFC0FF8F11EDAD3E550E6E80938D","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"10ep2","text":"Shake gently for   at   (sections should barely revolve around the vial).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":17,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":22,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8563p","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":172800,"guid":"29B11230FF8F11EDAD3E550E6E80938D","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"2CD69520FF8F11EDAD3E550E6E80938D","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8jpnl","text":"Rinse sections with PBS 3 times before starting secondary reactions.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
